name: 1-877-MATH-FOR-KIDSEasySquares
0:
”Alexa, open Easy Squares!”
”Alexa, start Easy Squares!”
”Alexa, play Easy Squares!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: easy squares
des:
Are you struggling with your squares? Well, struggle no more! 1-877-MATH-FOR-KIDS: Easy Squares is here to save the day! You and your little friends can practice your squares from 0 to 12 in this multiplayer game!

This skill is intended for use with Echo Buttons! However, in the very small chance in which you are currently lacking Echo Buttons, you should go order some right now! Or, you can tell Alexa that you are playing a one player game - the one player game does not require a set of Echo Buttons!

Wow, math is fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
